question: Consider the following statements regarding the ‘EmpowHER Biz’ initiative:  1. It offers mentorship and comprehensive training to aspiring women entrepreneurs.  2. Which of the following best describes ‘Garudakshi’, recently seen in the news?
options: It is software modelled on the online FIR system to curb wildlife and forests crime.
It is a new AI tool to monitor transactions through darknet
It is an initiative to build diesel-electric submarines for the Indian Navy
It is an online platform to monitor biomagnification of pesticides like DDT for the decline of eagle
answer: It is software modelled on the online FIR system to curb wildlife and forests crime.
